textBox.richText: So how did we grade PA4 part 1? I suggested the following list of criteria to Hiroshi: + Functionality -- does the code generate sensible outputs. At this stage we can accepts some minor defects. Part 2 will catch them. + Code quality -- Presence of comments, good programming style, naming conventions. + Test -- Presence of tests is a plus. + Development log -- The log should document the development of the software and the use of the software engineering techniques covered in class. Some remarks about the logs: [1] is a nice write up. The pair programming fragment is too detailed. Log is [2] at the right level of detail it give a an overview of what has been done, how it was tested and the development process. Log [3] needs to give an overview of the design. Log [4] is a bit to concise. For future projects consider using something similar to Blogger used by [2]. The Log should serve as project documentation and contain useful information.
